quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Friendship is the inexpressible comfort of feeling safe with a person, having neither to weigh thoughts nor measure words.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, with no judgment and only love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born when two people discover they have similar interests, thoughts, and values.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only flower that blooms in all seasons.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always honest and genuine, even when it's not what you want to hear.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only flower that blooms in all seasons.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the comfort of knowing that even when you feel alone, you're not.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who accepts your past, supports your present, and encourages your future.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is not about who you've known the longest, it's about who walked into your life and said, 'I'm here for you.'
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who sees the pain in your eyes while everyone else believes the smile on your face.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only relationship where you don't have to pretend to be someone else.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who can make you laugh even when you feel like crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the sweetest form of love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a rainbow between two hearts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the key to a happy heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who lifts you up when others have let you down.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the greatest gift you can give someone.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always by your side, through the ups and downs.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the bridge that connects hearts all over the world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the greatest treasure one can have.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you,' but how much you can prove that it's true.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that one generation can leave to another.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Love is a language spoken by everyone but understood only by the heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the only gold.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest adventure.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between two hearts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the most powerful force in the world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Love is like a butterfly; it goes where it pleases and it pleases wherever it goes.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take action, and you can change your world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.

quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The secret of success is to know something nobody else knows.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making it happen. It's about making it count.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

quotes.quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey.

quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making it happen. It's about making it count.

quotes.quote: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind, and spirit.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is health.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
quotes.author: Robert Urich

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To keep your body in good health is a duty, otherwise you will not be able to enjoy the world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
quotes.author: Robert Urich

quotes.quote: Health is like money, we never have a true idea of its value until we lose it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The power of lo,to change bodies is legendary, built into folklore, common sense, and everyday experience. Love moves the flesh, it pushes matter around.... Throughout history, 'tender loving care' has uniformly been recognized as a valuable element in healing.
quotes.author: Larry Dossey

quotes.quote: When the heart is at ease, the body is healthy.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Happiness is the highest form of health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: If you don't take care of your body, where are you going to live?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The human body has been designed to resist an infinite number of changes and attacks brought about by its environment. The secret of good health lies in successful adjustment to changing stresses on the body.
quotes.author: Harry J. Johnson

quotes.quote: Health is not simply the absence of sickness.
quotes.author: Hannah Green

quotes.quote: The doctor of the future will no longer treat the human frame with drugs, but rather will cure and prevent disease with nutrition.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The human body is the best work of art.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the less confidence I have in drugs and the greater is my confidence in the regulation and administration of diet and regimen.
quotes.author: John Redman Coxe

quotes.quote: The first wealth is health.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When diet is wrong, medicine is of no use. When diet is correct, medicine is of no need.
quotes.author: Ayurvedic Proverb

quotes.quote: Investing in your health will produce enormous benefits in every aspect of your life.
quotes.author: Roger Uzun

quotes.quote: Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Laughter is timeless, imagination has no age, and dreams are forever.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Laughter is the closest distance between two people.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Laughter is the language of the soul.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Laughter is the best medicine.

quotes.quote: Laughter is the sound of the soul dancing.

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness is a state of mind. It's just according to the way you look at things.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The happiest people don't have the best of everything, they make the best of everything.
